verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Give ear to my word, O Lord. Consider my meditation. Hearken unto the voice of my cry, My King and my God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For unto Thee will I pray. My voice shalt Thou hear in the morning. O Lord, in the morning Will I direct my prayer unto Thee And will look up.{/lang-eng}
